snippet.title: Nitro Kid - Official Announcement Trailer | Play DEMO Now!
snippet.description:
Wishlist and Play DEMO Now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1709050

Nitro Kid is a roguelike deckbuilder set in the neon ‘80s.
Build your deck of cyber kung-fu moves, use card combos and fight through the floors of INFINITY tower.
Featuring 30+ Synthwave tracks composed exclusively for the game.
Check it out the DEMO now!

Join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/MwGh8SsNKB

Follow the game:
https://twitter.com/nitrokid_wbs
https://www.facebook.com/NitroKidGame/
